Title: PAIR OF IDEAL CUT (HEARTS & ARROWS) LARGE 2 CARAT 8MM SIMULATED MOISSANITE GEMS
Description: Hi! This is an auction for one pair of LARGE, loose, round brilliant crystal clear radiant jewels that measure a huge 8 mm in diameter and weigh 2 carats EACH-- 4 carats total weight. These gorgeous jewels sparkle with intense fire and brilliance. They carry the highest rating-- D in color--ABSOLUTELY COLORLESS and FL in clarity--COMPLETELY FLAWLESS. Our gemstones mimic the optical properties of astronomically priced natural earth mined diamonds costing in excess of $50,000 EACH. These dazzling gems exhibit immense sparkle and fire without the slightest trace of yellow, green or gray tint. Not only are these jewels TOTALLY COLORLESS and HARD ENOUGH TO CUT GLASS, but this exquisitely matched pair of gemstones are so perfectly cut that they reflect light into a perfect HEARTS & ARROWS pattern which explodes into a crescendo of intense brilliance and scintillating radiance. THEY ARE LIKE TWO DAZZLING PERFECTLY MATCHED MINIATURE STARS. WHEN RATED FOR FIRE, SPARKLE AND BRILLIANCE ON A SCALE OF 1-10, THESE GEMSTONES RATE A FULL 10. ______ OUR GEMSTONES EXHIBIT THE VALUED HEARTS & ARROWS IDEAL CUT. THE HEARTS & ARROWS CUT SETS THE STANDARD WORLDWIDE AS THE ESSENCE OF PERFECTION AND BEAUTY. THIS IS THE CUT THAT IS MOST HIGHLY PRIZED SINCE IT OPTIMIZES THE FIRE AND LUSTRE OF A GEM. A HEARTS & ARROWS CUT REQUIRES THE GREATEST EXPERTISE TO CREATE... In a HEARTS & ARROWS pattern, all facets must be aligned precisely opposite each other and be exactly the same shape and size to produce a cut that is so perfectly symmetrical that it displays the HEARTS & ARROWS effect. Cutting the stones to these exacting proportions and then polishing them to obtain maximum light dispersion is extremely time consuming and is very costly since it can only be accomplished by a Master Cutter. 98% of light dispersion in a gemstone depends on the quality of the cut and the HEARTS & ARROWS round brilliant cut is the best quality cut available anywhere at any price. THROUGH THE MARRIAGE OF THE EXCELLENCE OF THE CUT-- COMBINED WITH A COMPLETE LACK OF COLOR AND PERFECT CRYSTAL CLARITY, YOU CAN MAKE THE SAME MAGNIFICENT IMPRESSION AS IF YOU WERE WEARING NATURAL EARTH MINED DIAMONDS COSTING TEN$ OF THOUSAND$ OF DOLLAR$ EACH. THESE GORGEOUS GEMS ARE SPECIALLY FORMULATED TO PERPETUALLY MAINTAIN THEIR COLOR-FREE CRYSTAL CLEAR PROPERTIES 100%. THAT'S WHY THEY ARE THE ONLY JEWELS YOU'LL DISCOVER ANYWHERE THAT CARRY OUR ONE OF A KIND LIFETIME REFUND OR FREE REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE NEVER TO YELLOW, BECOME CLOUDY, OR LOOSE THEIR INTENSE FIRE & SPARKLE EVER! MOREOVER, WITH OUR PEACE OF MIND UNCONDITIONAL LIFETIME GUARANTEE WE WILL QUICKLY PROVIDE A REFUND OR PROMPTLY REPLACE YOUR GEMS IF YOU ARE EVER UNHAPPY WITH THEM FOR ANY REASON! NO QUESTIONS ASKED. TO SEE RINGS MADE WITH THESE BEAUTIFUL GEMS PLEASE CLICK ON "SEE OTHER ITEMS" IN UPPER RIGHT.
